DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study characterize medical management squamous cell carcinoma head neck ( SCCHN ) patient diagnose recurrent/metastatic ( R/M ) disease ( 01July2013 30 June 2014 ) real-world setting .

DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( 18 year old old ) confirm diagnosis R/M head neck , may live deceased time enrollment study Diagnosis R/M head neck cancer 01July2013 30June2014 ( study index period ) If female patient , pregnant lactate 01July2013 30June2014 Enrolled cancer treatmentclinical trial since diagnosis R/M head neck cancer study index period
